El Salvador is looking forward for future players born in the [[United States of America]] to player for El Salvador national under-17 football team. Members from the Maryland, Virginia, and Dc area have organized a team of boys under 17 to play in a tournament in that area. The creater of this team is [[Virgilio Vasquez]]. It's players born or parents from El Salvador that are eligible to be in action. [[La Azulita]] have already won there first tournament at [[Dulles sports plex]] in [[sterling, va]]. ==Tournament Records== ===FIFA U-17 World Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:
